message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

Reasoning: The paper proposes a deep learning architecture for automatic news comment generation, which involves natural language processing and generation. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper involves optimization using back-propagation algorithm, which falls under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The use of deep learning also suggests cs.LG (Machine Learning) as a likely sub-category. The paper also involves information retrieval and comprehension, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), respectively.
